pages.text: The stone of air as well as the stone of fire was smelted one of the first. Air masters have great mobility in combat, which gives them an advantage.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: Air Flow - deals damage to the enemy while pushing them back by about 1 block.$(br)Gust of Wind - damages all enemies within 5 blocks (provided they are close to you).$(br)Air Flight - allows the master to fly temporarily into the air.$(br)$(br)$(br)$(br)Weapon: Air Rapier$(br)Passive ability: None
